title: Red Rocket 7
description: In the mid 1950s, seven mysterious beings show up in coastal Oregon, fulfilling a prophecy foretold in the scripture of a distant world. One of them--Red Rocket 7--goes on to make musical history with the biggest names in rock and roll--from Elvis and the Beatles to David Bowie, Nirvana, etc. Here is high sci-fi adventure for fans of pop culture. Graphic novel format.
author: Mike Allred
